item.name: Enable all Store Caches
item.description: Production Magento stores should have caches enabled at all times. Caches should never be flushed/refreshed/disabled.

item.name: Redis Cache
item.description: The default Magento file-storage for cache is suitable for development use only. Production stores must use Redis.

item.name: Store Logging
item.description: Unless store error logs are being read, they can cause unecessary bloat and performance overhead.

item.name: Customer Logging
item.description: Customer logging powers the "Online Customers" section of the admin, but comes with a performance penalty.

item.name: Top Navigation Depth
item.description: Setting a maximum depth for the top navigation ensures all categories are not loaded on every page.

item.name: Magento Profiler
item.description: The Magento profiler should never be used in a production environment. This should be disabled at all times.

item.name: Flat Catalog Category
item.description: Enable this setting for considerably improved performance, note that the store should be tested after enabling.

item.name: Flat Catalog Product
item.description: Enable this setting for considerably improved performance, note that the store should be tested after enabling.
